Normal.name: Missile Cluster
Normal.description: A swarm of <c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c> rockets. On their turn, one flies forward, dealing 1 damage on hit. The entire cluster is destroyed in one hit.

HE.name: Heavy Cluster
HE.description: A swarm of <c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c> heavy rockets. On their turn, one flies forward, dealing 2 damage on hit. The entire cluster is destroyed in one hit.

Seeker.name: Seeker Cluster
Seeker.description: A swarm of <c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c> seeker rockets. On their turn, one flies toward the opposing ship, dealing 1 damage. The entire cluster is destroyed in one hit.

HESeeker.name: Heavy Seeker Cluster
HESeeker.description: A swarm of <c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c> heavy seeker rockets. On their turn, one flies toward the opposing ship, dealing 2 damage. The entire cluster is destroyed in one hit.
